info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:27AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rock Island, northwestern Bureau and northern Henry Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 626 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Cleveland, or near East Moline, moving east at 55 mph. At 624 AM, a spotter in Silvis reported half inch hail. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Geneseo around 635 AM CDT. Atkinson around 645 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Annawan and Hooppole. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 3 and 45. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 9 and 14. Interstate 88 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
